Summary: I saw a white, luminous sphere which crossed the southern sky in four seconds.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt exactly nine fifty five p.m. in San Francisco, California I was walking down Beaver street between Castro and Noe street. I was at the top of Beaver street on the left hand side of the street walking down the Hill. I look up into the sky towards the south and I saw a luminous bright white sphere about three times as large as Jupiter and much brighter than Jupiter move accross the sky. I saw it at about a sixty degree angle about the horizon. In four seconds it moved accoss the sky and disappeared behind the fog. It was in a clear part of the night sky. The gibous moon was easily visable. The object was too fast and bright to be a sattelite and a plane at that altitude. I believe it was a U.F.O. I have seen several objects like this before but never reported them to MUFON because I did not know this organization existed. I have also have had three encounters of the first kind which I will be reporting to you in your "Best Evidence contest."
